title: Goldman Sachs to buy $1bn stake in T Rowe Price
summary: Tie-up marks push to pitch private investments to everyday investors

title: T. Rowe Price shares jump after deal where Goldman will invest $1 billion in asset manager
summary: Goldman will buy up to $1 billion in T. Rowe Price common stock through open market purchases with the intention to own up to 3.5%.

title: Bangladesh Becomes LNG’s Hottest Story
summary: Bangladesh has become Asia’s most active buyer of spot LNG cargoes – an unlikely new heavyweight in one of the world’s most volatile energy markets. Once largely self-sufficient in natural gas, the country now leans heavily on imported fuel to keep its factories running and its power sector alive. …

title: Orsted, Skyborn Sue U.S. Over Halt to 704-MW Revolution Wind
summary: Offshore wind developer Ørsted and joint-venture partner Skyborn Renewables filed suit in Washington, D.C., on Thursday, challenging the Interior Department’s stop-work order that froze construction on the 704-MW Revolution Wind project serving Rhode Island and Connecticut, Reuters reported. The co…

title: China's EV Market Slowdown Hits Top Players Hard
summary: China's hyper-competitive electric vehicle market means that even top players, such as BYD Auto, are no longer immune, as smaller players continue to gobble up increasing market share. title: Jellyfish Force another French Nuclear Reactor to Shut Down
summary: For a second time in three weeks, a swarm of jellyfish has forced the closure of a nuclear reactor in France in another curious incident in which jellyfish entered the filters of the water cooling systems. The Paluel nuclear power plant in Normandy, northern France, saw its electricity generation n…

title: How to get Rosaries in Silksong
summary: Gather this currency from across Pharloom to purchase items from merchants.
body: Acquiring Rosaries in Hollow Knight: Silksong is likely one of the first things you'll want to do while exploring. Unlike Geo in the original game, Silksong's primary currency for trading with merchants and NPCs doesn't come from defeating all bugs, meaning you can't farm it just by exploring areas and dispatching bugs. Instead, there are a few ways to get Rosaries, which you'll use to purchase items from merchants like Pebb in Bone Bottom or maps from Shakra once you encounter her. Here I'll explain the main ways to get Rosaries, though I'll update this if I come across any better methods later on. How to get Rosaries in Hollow Knight: Silksong Image 1 of 5 Hit hanging Rosaries to collect them (Image credit: Team Cherry) Image 2 of 5 You can also find Rosaries in certain chests (Image credit: Team Cherry) Image 3 of 5 Or consume Rosary items to acquire a number of the currency (Image credit: Team Cherry) Image 4 of 5 Or smash Rosary statues to collect them (Image credit: Team Cherry) Image 5 of 5 If you're struggling with rolling Rosaries, buy the Magnetite Brooch from Pebb (Image credit: Team Cherry) There are five main ways to get Rosaries in Silksong: Hitting Rosary strings yo…

title: Oil Prices Sink As EIA Confirms Surprise Inventory Build
summary: Crude oil inventories in the United States increased by 2.4 million barrels during the week ending August 29, after falling 2.4 million barrels in the week prior, according to new data from the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) released on Wednesday. title: U.S. Breaks LNG Export Record in August
summary: The United States exported more liquefied natural gas in August than in any other previous month, preliminary data from financial firm LSEG showed. August exports reached 9.33 million tonnes, beating the previous monthly record set in April of 9.25Mt. The higher volumes were due to the cessation of…

title: China Tackles Price Wars as Bloated Solar Sector Amasses Huge Losses
summary: China has launched in earnest the drive to curb excess capacity in the solar manufacturing sector, which has doomed many companies to price wars and deepening losses.
